Package com.camerontec.catalys.server.rules.actions

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAction
    All actions should implement this interface.
    IMessageProcessorAccessor
    Interface for actions that want to access the IFIXMessageProcessor they are contained in
    IRulesEngineMessageStoreAccessor  
    IRulesEngineRouteStoreAccessor  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionAddStoredTags
    Adds a number of fields retrieved from a related stored message - if found.
    ActionAddTags
    Sets or adds a field in a message.
    ActionAutoRoute
    This action is not configured.
    ActionBase
    Base class for most actions.
    ActionCopy
    Copies the value of one field to another or several others.
    ActionDiscard
    Stop message from proceeding further.
    ActionDropCopyTo
    A drop copy action that allows a copy of a message to a specific session
    ActionFieldsUnique
    Stores a number of fields from the current message to be checked for unique value later by ConditionFieldsUnique.
    ActionFileLookup
    Action that performs a lookup via a FileLookupService and writes the result to one or more fields in a message.
    ActionLog
    Action that logs a message at a specified log level
    ActionMapper
    A mapping action where a number of field values are mapped to new values based on configured resource
    ActionReject
    Creates a business rejectViaException message using the given reason text.
    ActionRemoveTags
    Removes a list of tags from a message.
    ActionReplaceAll
    Delegates to String.replaceAll(), intended as a concrete implementation of a common EL expression.
    ActionRouteTo
    TODO DOC-CFG make sure this is documented A routing action that allows routing a message to a specific session and optionally auto-routing related responses.
    ActionRouteToAdapter  
    ActionRulesPack
    An ActionRulesPack executes a rules pack, allowing conditional execution of RulesPacks.
    ActionSetExpression
    Action to set tag to a value created with Expression Language.
    ActionStoreTags
    Stores a number of fields from the current message to be retrieved later by ActionAddStoredTags.
    ActionStripChars
    Action to strip characters from given beginIndex up to endIndex from the given tag's value
    ActionTimezoneConversion
    An action which converts the specified date/time tags from one timezone to another.

    The action has the following properties: tags: A comma separated list of tags to be converted.
    ActionUnStoreTags
    Remove all related messages from the store
    ActionUpdateRouteStore
    This action is not configured.
    AutoRoutingResponse
    A special message processor used to route messages sent as response to other fix messages back to the originator of those messages.
    NilAction
    Does nothing except expose its properties for verification in tests.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ActionReject.RejectType
    Available reject types.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ActionFileLookupFailedException
    Exception that indicates a failed lookup by ActionFileLookup.
